LanguageData.PositioningEnabledExplained: Enables combat positioning for your mouse clicks/drags (see settings below)
LanguageData.AchtungModifierExplained: Holding this key will Force Draft colonists when they're given Move or Move-in-Formation commands. When held it will allow the selected colonists to be moved in their current formation at your cursor by holding and dragging the right mouse button. Once the right mouse button is held the Achtung! Key may be released. The formation can be rotated using Q and E.
LanguageData.CommandMenuModeOptionAutoExplained: The draft status of the colonist decides whether to show the context menu or move to the clicked location
LanguageData.CommandMenuModeOptionPressForMenuExplain: Hold the key to override the default action and display the context menu instead
LanguageData.CommandMenuModeOptionPressForPositionExp: Hold the key to override the context menu and issue a positioning command
LanguageData.CommandMenuModeOptionDelayedExplained: Hold down the right-click button; the action will switch from positioning to displaying the context menu after the defined delay
LanguageData.DelayExplained: Duration in milliseconds to hold right-click before the context menu appears, overriding positioning
LanguageData.RescueEnabledExplained: Enables the automatic rescue of pawns and adds a column on the work tab
LanguageData.ShowForceEndLetterExplained: When enabled, a letter is shown when a colonist runs out of forced work
LanguageData.ReplaceCleanRoomExplained: Replaces the vanilla clean room job with Achtung's clean room
LanguageData.ReplaceFightFireExplained: Replaces the vanilla fight fire job with Achtung's fight fire
LanguageData.IncreaseForceRadiusDesc: Increase the search distance for forced work (current radius is {0})
LanguageData.DecreaseForceRadiusDesc: Decrease the search distance for forced work (current radius is {0})
LanguageData.BuildingSmartDesc: Building smart prevents holes or getting stuck but is slower and always builds around your start location
LanguageData.Note1: When using Achtung the context menu contains both: drafted and undrafted commands
LanguageData.BreakLevelExplained: Set the break level at which a colonist stop a given Achtung job
LanguageData.HealthLevelExplained: Set the health status at which a colonist stop a given Achtung job
LanguageData.IgnoreForbiddenExplained: Allows forced work on forbidden items
LanguageData.IgnoreRestrictionsExplained: Allows forced work in restricted areas
LanguageData.IgnoreAssignmentsExplained: Allows forced work when work priorities are unset
LanguageData.BuildingSmartTitle: Smart building is on for new Achtung! jobs
LanguageData.BuildingSmartExplained: Sets the default for how new jobs choose their build order
LanguageData.WorkMarkersExplained: Forced work is displayed with small markers
LanguageData.MaxForcedItemsExplained: Restricts the number of forced items for slower computers
LanguageData.CleanRoomDescription: Clean a room until it is completely clean
LanguageData.FireFightDescription: Fights a fire (even outside home zone)
LanguageData.SowZoneDescription: Sow a growing zone or room until it is completely sowed
LanguageData.TacticalApproachDescription: Engages the enemy tactically in order to kill them
LanguageData.CouldNotFindMoreForcedWork: {0} could not find more forced work. The remaining work is most likely reserved or not accessible.
LanguageData.WorkType_Rescue_Description: Wounded colonists are brought to beds where they can be treated.
